subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: An eerie silence descended on Ohio Stadium when Ohio State’s Heisman Trophy hopeful Chris Wells went down with a foot injury in the third quarter of the second-ranked Buckeyes’ 43-0 victory over Youngstown State on Saturday.
snippet: An eerie silence descended on Ohio Stadium when Ohio State’s Heisman Trophy hopeful Chris Wells went down with a foot injury in the third quarter of the second-ranked Buckeyes’ 43-0 victory over Youngstown State on Saturday.
